name: Liberation (mickplouffe)
description:
USE THE DOWNLOAD VERSION

OR

If Playing in the web version, allow 20 seconds for the world to stabilize!! Death has been disabled to allow players to test the game.

IT IS REALLY RECOMMENDED TO USE THE Windows EXE!
A Mac version for Intel AND M1 is available below.

Controls:

W A S D - Move

F - Dash

Left Click - Shoot

Hold escape 5 seconds to quit the game

    Liberate the souls of the monsters 

Collect the souls

Gain different boosts

Double Jump Attack Boost

                                             Defeat the Boss!

Get the small monsters first!

You need boosts from the monsters to defeat the boss, else you may shoot forever!

Credit:

Game development - Mickplouffe

Music and sound - Satshi

Thanks for testing our game, it's our first game jam, it was fun and challenging!

And I swear to god those 2 hours we overslept the morning of the upload would have been best awake than sleeping!!
